channel.title: Link failure due to underlying exception
channel.description:
I'ved tried everything, i just keep coming up short..
[code] MESSAGE: Communications link failure due to underlying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.io.EOFException
STACKTRACE:
java.io.EOFException at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.readFully(MysqlIO.java:1963) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.reuseAndReadPacket(MysqlIO.java:2375) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2874) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1623) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1715) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3243) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3172) at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeQuery(Statement.java:1197) at net.com.codeusa.io.FileManager.loadCharacter(FileManager.java:208) at net.com.codeusa.net.codec.RS2LoginProtocol.login(RS2LoginProtocol.jav a:184) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.connectAwaitingPlayers(Engine.java:332) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:203) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION ** [/code]
now im getting this when i start up the server with eclipse.
[code]QL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for th e right syntax to use near ' degrade=6000, mute=0, specAmount=0, spellbook=192, xlog=0, quests=0, look0=0, l' at line 1[/code]
[code]String main = "UPDATE members SET rights=" + p.rights + ", absx=" + p.absX + ", absy=" + p.absY + ", height=" + p.heightLevel + ", gender=" + p.gender + ", energy=" + p.runEnergy + ", givenRep=" + p.givenRep + ", playerRep=" + p.playerRep + ", repTimer=" + p.repTimer + ", called=" + p.called + ", starter=" + p.starter + ", chatName=" + p.chatName + ", KC=" + p.KC + ", DC=" + p.DC + ", PVPpotential=" + p.PVPPotential + ", kills=" + p.kills + ", totalKills=" + p.totalKills + ", sExperience=" + p.spendingExperience + ", lastKilled=" + p.lastKilled + ", degrade=" + p.degrade + ", mute=" + p.muteType + ", specAmount=" + p.specAmount + ", spellbook=" + p.spellbook + ", xlog=" + p.combatType + ", quests=" + p.questStage;[/code]
i dont see syntax anywhere :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 11:39:37 pm[/size]

item.title: Link failure due to underlying exception

item.description:
@codeusa45 wrote:

Fixed it, just gotta work on sha1 encryption now.

item.title: Link failure due to underlying exception
item.dc:creator: @codeusa45 codeusa45
item.description:
@codeusa45 wrote:

I’ved tried everything, i just keep coming up short…

[code] MESSAGE: Communications link failure due to underlying exception:

** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **

java.io.EOFException

STACKTRACE:

java.io.EOFException
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.readFully(MysqlIO.java:1963)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.reuseAndReadPacket(MysqlIO.java:2375)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2874)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1623)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1715)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3243)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:3172)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Statement.executeQuery(Statement.java:1197)
at net.com.codeusa.io.FileManager.loadCharacter(FileManager.java:208)
at net.com.codeusa.net.codec.RS2LoginProtocol.login(RS2LoginProtocol.jav
a:184)
at net.com.codeusa.Engine.connectAwaitingPlayers(Engine.java:332)
at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:203)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
[/code]

now im getting this when i start up the server with eclipse.

QL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for th e right syntax to use near ' degrade=6000, mute=0, specAmount=0, spellbook=192, xlog=0, quests=0, look0=0, l' at line 1

String main = "UPDATE members SET rights=" + p.rights + ", absx=" + p.absX + ", absy=" + p.absY + ", height=" + p.heightLevel + ", gender=" + p.gender + ", energy=" + p.runEnergy + ", givenRep=" + p.givenRep + ", playerRep=" + p.playerRep + ", repTimer=" + p.repTimer + ", called=" + p.called + ", starter=" + p.starter + ", chatName=" + p.chatName + ", KC=" + p.KC + ", DC=" + p.DC + ", PVPpotential=" + p.PVPPotential + ", kills=" + p.kills + ", totalKills=" + p.totalKills + ", sExperience=" + p.spendingExperience + ", lastKilled=" + p.lastKilled + ", degrade=" + p.degrade + ", mute=" + p.muteType + ", specAmount=" + p.specAmount + ", spellbook=" + p.spellbook + ", xlog=" + p.combatType + ", quests=" + p.questStage;

i dont see syntax anywhere :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 11:39:37 pm[/size]
